title: Silca Has New Ultimate Tubeless Sealant
content:
Today, Silca rolled out its all-new sealant called Ultimate Tubeless Sealant. Didn’t Silca have sealant before? They did. But this new sealant is a return to the drawing board moment. The Ultimate Tubeless Sealant features what the brand calls Injectable Fiberfoam. After two and a half years of research, development, and testing, this Injectable Fiberfoam is easy to pump into your valve core, with either Silca’s new syringe or with others on the market, and has been formulated to last longer.

John’s been using this new Ultimate Tubeless Sealant in his tires for a few weeks now, so expect a more in-depth look shortly, but if you want to learn more, roll on over to Silca’s blog to read all about it. And to the Silca webshop to try out a bottle.
